Reviews.Title: “Capital Inn, Rome (Giardinetti)”
Reviews.Author: eciarma
Reviews.Content: hello fellow travelers youre looking clean inexpensive hotel hustle bustle rome stay minutes train station property located quiet safe suburb called internet connectivity included bit pricey shower stalls overall spacious clean quiet breakfast menu morning included variety delicious fruit meats pastries juices fresh espresso coffee service topnotch courteous polite stay time visit rome absolutely

Reviews.Title: “Almost 4 stars hotel but outside Rome!”
Reviews.Author: maniac_the_evil
Reviews.Content: hotel situated outside rome clean space inside nice terace restaurant reception didnt city map bar buying beer menu 3 euro night beer costed 4 euro third 5 euro receipt ticket buying careful prices depending

Reviews.Title: “disaster”
Reviews.Author: marietta025
Reviews.Content: spent 3 days staying hotel experience located miles city center wasted hour morning destination obliged wait centuries electricity card onthe bathroom tiny peoplethey stay 3 students third bed camp bedwe breakfast dinner hotelfood service ate day plate days fruits waiters spoke english sum suggest placethere hotels eternal ps excuse english
